sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ConferenceData } from '../../providers/conference-data'; @Component({ selector: 'app-news-feed', templateUrl: './news-feed.page.html', styleUrls: ['./news-feed.page.scss'], }) export class NewsFeedPage implements OnInit { speakers: any[] = []; constructor(public confData: ConferenceData) { } ionViewDidEnter() { this.confData.getSpeakers().subscribe((speakers: any[]) => { this.speakers = speakers; }); } ngOnInit() { } } News Feed Nine Inch Nails Live

The most popular industrial group ever, and largely responsible for bringing the music to a mass audience.
